an6.90:1.1: “Mendicants, an individual accomplished in view has given up these six things.
an6.90:1.3: Substantialist view, doubt, misapprehension of precepts and observances, and forms of greed, hate, and delusion that lead to rebirth in places of loss.
an6.90:1.4: An individual accomplished in view has given up these six things.”
